Introduction
This topic contains information regarding VA’s policy of recognizing only one father and one mother of a Veteran, including
handling cases in which two persons of the same sex claim to be the Veteran’s parent
example of a case in which two persons of the same sex claim to be the Veteran’s parent
considering the legal termination of a biological parent’s parental rights
, and
example of the legal termination of a biological parent’s parental rights
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section A - Establishing Parental Relationship
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section A
